### Chart B

```{r}
plastic_companies <- plastics %>%
  filter(year == "2019") %>%
  select(parent_company, grand_total) %>%
  filter(parent_company != "Grand Total") %>%
  filter(parent_company != "null") %>%
  filter(parent_company != "NULL") %>%
  filter(parent_company != "Unbranded") %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  group_by(parent_company) %>%
  summarise(ggrand = sum(grand_total)) %>%
  arrange(desc(ggrand)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  slice(1:20) %>%
  rename(Company = parent_company) %>%
  rename(Total = ggrand) %>%
  datatable(options = list(pagelength = 12), caption = "Collected Total Pieces of Plastic Pollution per Company in 2019")
plastic_companies
```
